name: 1 - MyRPG
description:
MyRPG is a small basic RPG made in about 2 weeks with Aurelien Marcel, Mathis Chretien and Pierre Hamel.

It is a 1rst year EPITECH (5years IT engineer school) project made on fedora 32 Linux using the CSFML library.

This project can also be git cloned/pulled from https://github.com/EpitechIT2020/B-MUL-200-REN-2-1-myrpg-aurelien.marcel (where you can also see a list of the features).
